name: WOLF
description: Wolfswap is an AI-integrated Gamified aggregator DEX perfect for traders across multiple chains, we use liquidity across all major DEXs and offer the best trades for the end user that utilizes our platform. Gamification Structure: - We have traders' leaderboards, and user achievements based on their trades in work, daily missions, trading competitions, etc. - Mystery Boxes, where every swap matters. Every swap of over 10$ made on Wolfswap, has a chance to trigger a random prize in terms of NFTs and/or Tokens we sweep on the blockchains we are built on to also support builders while giving back. - AI Integration on an aggregator DEX. This is a game changer for the memecoin traders, as they'll be able to visualize contract safety scores right on our platform. We generate contract safety scores by running different AI algorithms to check all the contracts on a chain. The AI Scanner is live and already saved tens/hundreds/thousands of community $$, giving them the option to catch honeypots or bad contracts fast with zero knowledge of how to read a contract. DCA module, for busy traders who want to trade but do not have the time to track the price every single minute
